title: Executive Order 6683-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6474, of December 4, 1933, and of Executive Order No. 6576, of January 25, 1934
content: Paragraph (3) of Executive Order No. 6474, of December 4, 1933, relating to the establishment of the Federal Alcohol Control Administration, etc., as amended by Executive Order No. 6576, of January 25, 1934, is hereby amended to read as follows:
" (3) The following-named persons are hereby designated and appointed as the present members of the Federal Alcohol Control Administration established under the provisions of said title:
Joseph H. Choate, Jr.            Harris E. Willingham            W. A. Tarver            Willard L. Thorp            John E. Dalton            Frederic P. Lee"
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6683-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6474, of December 4, 1933, and of Executive Order No. 6576, of January 25, 1934 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362450
